gw.solr.consistency

Class ConsistencyTrackerBuilder

  • gw.solr.consistency.ConsistencyTrackerBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject

    public class ConsistencyTrackerBuilder
implements _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject
    Builder for consistency tracker. Allows configuration of cache size and timing as well as forces provision of the document reconstructor
